channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaWiki -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaWiki -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-0366|2024-09-16T16:13:20.587Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw allowing to evade SVG filter using default attribute values in DTD declaration.

item.title: CVE-2017-0372|2024-09-16T16:27:46.256Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki%20%28syntaxhighlight%20extension%29
item.description: Parameters injection in the SyntaxHighlight extension of Mediawiki before 1.23.16, 1.27.3 and 1.28.2 might result in multiple vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2017-0370|2024-09-16T17:02:56.884Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw were Spam blacklist is ineffective on encoded URLs inside file inclusion syntax's link parameter.
